submissionForm.uploadText: Click or drag images to this area to upload
submissionForm.uploadHint: Or paste screenshots directly. Supports multiple JPG/PNG images, single file < 2MB, max 5 files.

requestDetails.title: Request Details
requestDetails.parsingErrorInvalidObject: Parsed response is not a valid object.
requestDetails.parsingErrorInvalidType: Response type is invalid or unexpected.
requestDetails.parsingErrorEmptyResponse: Analysis successful, but response content is empty.
requestDetails.analysisCompletedButFailed: Analysis completed but marked as failed, no detailed results.
requestDetails.regenerateSuccess: Request #{{id}} has been re-queued for analysis.
requestDetails.noProblemDetails: Formatted problem details not found in analysis results
requestDetails.diffMissingBoth: Cannot generate diff: Missing original and modified code.
requestDetails.noModifiedCode: Modified code not found in analysis results.
requestDetails.diffGeneralError: No code changes detected or error generating diff.
requestDetails.noAnalysisDetails: Detailed modification point analysis not found in results.
requestDetails.noOriginalCode: Original code information not found in analysis results.
requestDetails.noDataSelected: No request selected or no data available

initializationPage.errorMessage: Initialization failed. Please check the backend connection and refresh.

validation.passwordMismatch: The two passwords that you entered do not match!
validation.apiKeyRequired: Please input your OpenAI API Key!
validation.numberRequired: Please enter an integer greater than 0!

initializationPage.errorMessageDefault: Initialization failed. Please check your input and try again.
initializationPage.successDescription: The application will be ready shortly...
initializationPage.welcomeMessage: Welcome! Please complete the initial setup for the admin account, API, and advanced configurations step by step.
initializationPage.apiKeyTooltip: Your Secret Key obtained from the OpenAI website.
initializationPage.baseUrlTooltip: Fill this in if you need to access OpenAI via a proxy or use a compatible API endpoint.
initializationPage.modelTooltip: Specify the OpenAI model to use, e.g., gpt-4-turbo or gpt-3.5-turbo. Leave blank to use the backend default.
initializationPage.systemPromptTooltip: The system prompt used to guide the behavior of the OpenAI model.
initializationPage.systemPromptPlaceholder: Define the model's role and task...
initializationPage.maxConcurrentTooltip: The maximum number of analysis tasks allowed to be processed concurrently.
initializationPage.parallelRequestsTooltip: The number of OpenAI requests initiated in parallel for a single user prompt.
initializationPage.maxAttemptsLabel: Max Total OpenAI Attempts per Prompt
initializationPage.maxAttemptsTooltip: The maximum total number of OpenAI attempts allowed for a single user prompt (including parallel and potential retries).
initializationPage.timeoutTooltip: The timeout duration (in seconds) for processing a single request.

app.checkStatusError: Failed to check application status. Please try refreshing.
app.fetchDetailsError: Failed to fetch details for Request #{{id}}. Please try again.
app.regenerationSuccess: New analysis request #{{id}} created and processing started.
app.title: Code Analysis Tool
app.footer: Code Analysis Tool Â©{{year}} | Powered by Ant Design

statusIndicator.queuedDescription: Your request has been successfully submitted and will be processed in order.
statusIndicator.failedDescription: Unable to complete analysis. Please check your input and try again.

adminRequests.batchActionWarning: {{count}} requests failed during batch operation. Check console for details.

adminLayout.websocketReconnectFailed: Failed to reconnect to real-time updates after multiple attempts
adminLayout.loadDetailsError: Failed to refresh details for request #{{id}} after update
adminLayout.refreshDetailsError: Failed to refresh full details for request #{{id}} after update.

requestManagement.title: Request Management
requestManagement.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this request?
requestManagement.retryConfirm: Are you sure you want to retry this request?
requestManagement.batchDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected requests?
requestManagement.batchRetryConfirm: Are you sure you want to retry {{count}} selected requests?

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.profileUpdateSuccessUsernameChanged: Profile updated. You will need to log in again with your new username.
settingsPage.profileUpdateErrorNoUser: Could not update profile: User not found
settingsPage.profileUsernameTooltip: The unique username for logging into the Admin Panel.
settingsPage.profileNewPasswordTooltip: Leave blank to keep the current password. Must be at least 8 characters.
settingsPage.passwordMinLengthError: Password must be at least 8 characters
settingsPage.restartNoteDescription: Changes to app settings will take effect after the service is restarted.

openai_api_key.label: OpenAI API Key
openai_api_key.tooltip: Your API key for OpenAI. Keep this secret.

openai_base_url.label: OpenAI Base URL
openai_base_url.tooltip: The URL for a proxy or alternative OpenAI API endpoint.

openai_model.label: OpenAI Model
openai_model.tooltip: The OpenAI model to use for analysis, e.g., 'gpt-4-turbo'.

system_prompt.label: System Prompt
system_prompt.tooltip: The system-level instruction used when sending prompts to the AI for analysis.

max_concurrent_analyses.label: Max Concurrent Analyses
max_concurrent_analyses.tooltip: Maximum number of analyses to run simultaneously

parallel_requests_per_prompt.label: Parallel Requests Per Prompt
parallel_requests_per_prompt.tooltip: Number of parallel API requests per analysis

max_attempts_per_prompt.label: Max Attempts Per Prompt
max_attempts_per_prompt.tooltip: Maximum retry attempts for failed requests

request_timeout.label: Request Timeout (seconds)
request_timeout.tooltip: Timeout for API requests in seconds

max_concurrent_analysis_tasks.label: Max Concurrent Analysis Tasks
max_concurrent_analysis_tasks.tooltip: The maximum number of analysis requests the system can process at the same time.

parallel_openai_requests_per_prompt.label: Parallel OpenAI Requests per Prompt
parallel_openai_requests_per_prompt.tooltip: How many parallel requests to send to OpenAI for a single analysis task.

max_total_openai_attempts_per_prompt.label: Max Total OpenAI Attempts per Prompt
max_total_openai_attempts_per_prompt.tooltip: The maximum total number of times to try calling the OpenAI API for a single analysis task before giving up.

request_timeout_seconds.label: Request Timeout (seconds)
request_timeout_seconds.tooltip: The timeout in seconds for a single OpenAI API request.
